ygData.subject: RE: re: grouping
ygData.msgSnippet: everything in there is 30+, and those greater kobolds just at the zone hit for 80+ and love to group up.  so be careful. Shada D ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
ygData.messageBody:
everything in there is 30+, and those greater kobolds just at the zone hit
for 80+ and love to group up. so be careful.

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 23 High Elf Paladin
Tyria, Level 17 High Elf Wizard
Mithaniel Marr Server
